Package weka.gui.experiment

Class ExperimenterDefaults

java.lang.Object
weka.gui.experiment.ExperimenterDefaults
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ExperimenterDefaults extends Object implements Serializable
This class offers get methods for the default Experimenter settings in the props file weka/gui/experiment/Experimenter.props.
Version:
$Revision: 11944 $
Author:
FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
See Also:
